name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: The most powerful iPhone ever with a titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and advanced camera system.

name: MacBook Pro 14"
description: Supercharged by M3 Pro or M3 Max, MacBook Pro takes its power and speed further than ever.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: The most advanced Apple Watch ever with a powerful new chip and innovative new features.

name: iPad Pro
description: Supercharged by M2, iPad Pro is the ultimate iPad experience with advanced displays and cameras.

name: AirPods Pro
description: Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, and Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking.

name: Magic Mouse
description: Wireless and rechargeable, with an optimized foot design that lets it glide smoothly across your desk.

name: Magic Keyboard
description: Delivers a remarkably comfortable and precise typing experience for Mac and Apple Vision Pro.

name: MagSafe Battery Pack
description: Compact, intuitive design makes on-the-go charging easy. The perfectly aligned magnets keep it attached to your iPhone.

name: iMac 2025
description: The world's best all-in-one desktop. Supercharged by M4 chip. Built for Apple Intelligence. With a 24-inch 4.5K display.

name: Apple Vision Pro
description: Apple Vision Pro is Apple's first spatial computer. It seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space using revolutionary technology.
